html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02642023-03-27FIN
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act, Amending the Fuel Charge Regulations and Repealing the Part 1 of the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act Regulations (Alberta)
PrecisRegulations Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT and REPEALING THE PART 1 OF THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT REGULATIONS (ALBERTA) in order to (1) integrate the Alberta output-based pricing system (OBPS) and the Ontario OBPS with the fuel charge; (2) specify the fuel charge rates in Schedule 2 of the Act to reflect the new carbon price trajectory; (3) implement measures released for consultation on August 9, 2022; and (4) incorporate minor technical amendments related to the fuel charge system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0062 Publication Date: 2023-04-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act, Amending the Fuel Charge Regulations and Repealing the Part 1 of the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act Regulations (Alberta)
precis: Regulations Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT and REPEALING THE PART 1 OF THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT REGULATIONS (ALBERTA) in order to (1) integrate the Alberta output-based pricing system (OBPS) and the Ontario OBPS with the fuel charge; (2) specify the fuel charge rates in Schedule 2 of the Act to reflect the new carbon price trajectory; (3) implement measures released for consultation on August 9, 2022; and (4) incorporate minor technical amendments related to the fuel charge system.
